name: Jump & Fly!
description:
Do precise jump and fly a long way to reach new places waiting to be discovered!

With a custom physics engine and animated ragdoll physics, Jump & Fly is the most dynamic and entertaining "roof jump" experience ever created! Defy the laws of physics and prove yourself worthy!

【Features】
- Realistic ragdoll physics
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Smooth and beautiful animation
- Colourful 3D graphics
- Extremely smooth touch control.

【How to play】
Jump off the roof to fly as far as possible and upgrade your stats! Improve your best distance and unlock new abilities, become braver, more precision and stronger!

The further you travel the more money you get!

Using simple game mechanics you can jump and fly with only one finger.

Make your "roof jump" dreams a reality.
Master the most extreme jumps and flies.
How far will you get?
